name: 2Birds1Stone
description:
2 Birds 1 Stone is an arcade style game where the objective is to shoot as many birds as you can!  Getting multiple birds with 1 stone activates a multiplier increasing your points by x2, x3, x4, x5, or as many birds as you can hit at once!  This game was made within 1 month for the GameOff 2022 Gamejam.  Enjoy, and thanks for playing!

Can be played with keyboard and mouse, or controller

WASD/Left thumbstick : Panning

Mouse/Right thumbstick : Look around

(L)Mouse Button/Bottom Face : Press-Pull slingshot, Release-Fire, Pause Confirm

P/esc/Start : Pause Menu

WASD/D-Pad/L-Thumbstick : Menu Navigation

*Sound effects, Some Textures, Water Splashes Pre-made*
